short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Archive email quickly in Seznam email

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extensions helps to use Seznam email in Zero Inbox way. Which means that your inbox is your TODO list and you archive all solved emails. But normally it's quite annoying to archive emails in Seznam email - you need two clicks and it's error prone. This adds a button to archive email in a single click. The extension is open-source, feel free to contribute. More features like snoozing email would be great.
